incident_updates.body: Start time : 19/10/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 19/10/2022 07:00 UTC Service impact : Downtime on servers in this rack for 2 hours. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be replacing cooling system module.

Start time : 19/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 19/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : Power source switched to batteries for 1 minute. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to test some UPS batteries.

Start time : 19/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 19/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : Power source switched to batteries for 1 minute. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to test some UPS batteries.
Start time : 19/10/1022 11:00 UTC End time :19/10/1022 19:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We need to fix a malfunction on the cooling system.
Start time : 19/10/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 19/10/2022 19:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 20/10/2022 02:00 UTC End time : 20/10/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an operation on some network equipment.
Start time : 20/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 20/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Test in charge of low voltage generators on SBG5
Start time : 20/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 20/10/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to perform annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 20/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 20/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Test in charge of low voltage generators on SBG3
Start time : 20/10/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 20/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, some generator set will be checked.

Start time : 20/10/2022 09:00 UTC End time : 20/10/2022 16:40 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on our cooling system
Start time : 24/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 24/10/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to perform annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 24/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 27/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to Perform annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.

Start time : 24/10/2022 21:00 UTC End time : 24/10/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our backbone infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on our backbone between EUROPE and APAC region to minimize traffic latency
Start time : 25/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 25/10/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to perform annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.

Start time : 25/10/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 25/10/2022 08:00 UTC Service impact : Servers in rack W14B11 will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on our cooling system
Start time : 26/10/2022 06:00UTC End time : 26/10/2022 16:00UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our annual maintenance, we need to check our power generators 3 and 4.

Start time : 26/10/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 26/10/2022 11:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform an operation of Data Centers core interconnection.

Start time : 03/11/2022 13:00 UTC End time : 03/11/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : For SNC customers who have not correctly configured the two active IPsec VPNs on two different VPNGWs, there will be an interruption of IP traffic between the SNC site and the customer site through the IPsec tunnel for the duration of the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.
Start time : 08/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 08/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, some generator set will be checked.

Start time : 09/11/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 09/11/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : As part of our partner's maintenance policy, the OVHCloud Connect services at TH2 and PA3 will be interrupted for a period of 30 minutes. Service improvement : Within the framework of improvement of the quality of the infrastructure, Orange will apply a network maintenance.
Start time : 10/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will perform load tests on the generators.
Start time : 15/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 15/11/2022 13:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, some generator set will be checked.
Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the intervention. A future update will indicate the date and time of the operation
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 15/09/2022 00:00 UTC End time : 15/09/2022 03:00 UTC Service impact : Some customers may experience some loss of service during the operations. Service improvement : A network equipment will be replaced.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
